message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I believe it's a fair price considering the value I can get from it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $9,000.  It's still a great deal considering what you'll gain from it.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $9,000 is the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $8,500. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
